item.description:
We have decided to continue with one meeting on Locke before moving onto Rousseau's Social Contract. Locke's Second Treatise of Civil Government is available on the web: http://www.constituti...

I have updated the NearFuturePlan.txt so that after the Social Contract we will continue with Schopenhauer's The World as Will and Representation. Please familiarize yourself with this NearFuturePlan.txt file. Especially if you would like to propose texts to be read, on any given meeting new proposal for works should be made only for the meeting after the next or for later.
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask for the philosophy group from the stuff.
item.name: Locke: Second Treatise of Civil Government
